tiles.title: MPRIS panel
tiles.text: MPRIS panel uses a 'smart-switching' technique to effortlessly control multiple media players in linux.

tiles.title: kindlepass
tiles.text: kindlepass is designed to streamline the retrieval of licenses for legacy Kindle devices.

tiles.title: meross
tiles.text: meross provides tools and documentation for detaching Meross smart products from the cloud.

tiles.title: Action-On-LAN
tiles.text: Action-On-LAN listens for Wake-On-LAN magic packets and runs a custom shell command upon detection

tiles.title: stateful
tiles.text: stateful is a tile based Pebble app, able to control RESTful API's with minimal clicks.

tiles.title: roomAPI
tiles.text: roomAPI is a tailored RESTful service for home automation, coded using Flask-RESTful.

tiles.title: teams-js-injector
tiles.text: teams-js-injector injects custom JavaScript & CSS payloads into Microsoft Teams.

tiles.title: tvcom
tiles.text: tvcom is an assistance module that provides a friendly interface for commanding LG TVs via a serial connection.

tiles.title: soundy
tiles.text: soundy is a helper script for controlling alsa sinks via the command line.
